Engineers are critical to the progress of many industries.They are responsible for designing, constructing, and maintaining machines, devices, structures, software etc.With the advancement in technological innovation and engineering design works, they have been able to develop new technologies that have improved peopleâ€™ s lives tremendously.

Engineers design products and systems that need to be adapted or used with complex scientific or mathematical concepts.They must have a specific set of skills which may include computer programming, research on the subject of engineering design works being done by other engineers etc.The work is usually done at engineering firms where they have access to all required tools and equipment for designing as well as prototypes or models for testing these designs before mass production begins.
